title: Between Kanye and the Midterms, the Unsettling Stream of Antisemitism
description: For American Jews, this fall has become increasingly worrisome. On Thursday alone, the F.B.I. warned of threats to New Jersey synagogues and the Nets suspended Kyrie Irving.
dc:creator: Michael Paulson and Ruth Graham
media:description: Police stand outside Temple Beth-El synagogue in Jersey City, N.J., on Thursday. The FBI said it had received credible information about a “broad” threat to synagogues in the state.
